org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVREyeRenderDesc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVREyeRenderDesc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class OVREyeRenderDesc
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Rendering information for each eye. Computed by either OVR.ovrHmd_GetRenderDesc(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) based on the specified FOV. Note that the rendering viewport is not included here as it can be specified separately and modified per frame by passing different viewport values in the layer structure.
